item.title: HowTO Install Netdata
item.description: Let’s talk about Netdata. Netdata is a daemon which runs on your device(s) collecting data in real time. It has a very nice interface and it’s possible to see your devices from anywhere with Netdata Cloud (once you add your nodes into it). For monitoring there are a lot of tools which are great like Nagios, Icinga, Prometheus, etc but this one is really easy to install and use from home without doing a lot of stuff.
